verbs.description: sky sports pundit paul merson lavishes praise on west ham starlet after [ARGM-MNR: impressive] [V: showing] sky sports pundit paul merson heaped praise on west ham united youngster ​grady diangana on saturday after the midfielder impressed during his side 4 - 2 premier league win over burnley the 20-year - old has managed to break into manuel pellegrini side despite the stiff competition for places in the expensively assembled squad diangana plays as an attacking midfielder on the right wing and caused burnley all manner of problems with his pace england declan rice rio ferdinand west ham united burnley manuel pellegrini reece oxford london democratic republic of congo diangana democratic republic of the congo felipe anderson paul merson michael carrick lions frank lampard nicolás castillo hammers sky sports
